welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tottenham, a vibrant and diverse neighborhood known for its rich history, charming streets, and lively atmosphere. We invite you to explore our local shops, sample our delicious cuisines, and immerse yourself in the unique culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: A Taste of Freedom Country Inn
restaurants.description: A Taste of Freedom Country Inn is a french restaurant located in Tottenham.
restaurants.address: 24 Mill St. W, Tottenham ON L0G 1W0

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers luxury services for private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Stansted Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds or usage restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Rochester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Rochester Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
